an5.100:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an5.100:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nama koliyaputto ayasmato mahamoggallanassa upatthako adhunakalankato annataram manomayam kayam upapanno.
an5.100:1.4: Tassa evarupo attabhavapatilabho hoti—seyyathapi nama dve va tini va magadhakani gamakkhettani.
an5.100:1.5: So tena attabhavapatilabhena neva attanam no param byabadheti.
an5.100:2.1: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahamoggallanam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho kakudho devaputto ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
an5.100:2.4: Sahacittuppada ca, bhante, devadatto tassa iddhiya parihino”ti.
an5.100:2.6: Idam vatva ayasmantam mahamoggallanam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an5.100:3.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.100:4.1: “Kakudho nama, bhante, koliyaputto mamam upatthako adhunakalankato annataram manomayam kayam upapanno hoti.
an5.100:4.2: Tassa evarupo attabhavapatilabho—seyyathapi nama dve va tini va magadhakani gamakkhettani.
an5.100:4.3: So tena attabhavapatilabhena neva attanam no param byabadheti.
an5.100:4.4: Atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto mam etadavoca:
an5.100:4.7: Sahacittuppada ca, bhante, devadatto tassa iddhiya parihino’ti.
an5.100:4.9: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
an5.100:5.1: “Kim pana te, moggallana, kakudho devaputto cetasa ceto paricca vidito:
an5.100:5.2: ‘yam kinci kakudho devaputto bhasati sabbam tam tatheva hoti, no annatha’”ti?
an5.100:5.3: “Cetasa ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
an5.100:5.4: ‘yam kinci kakudho devaputto bhasati sabbam tam tatheva hoti, no annatha’”ti.
an5.100:5.7: Idani so moghapuriso attanava attanam patukarissati.
an5.100:6.1: Pancime, moggallana, sattharo santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an5.100:6.3: Idha, moggallana, ekacco sattha aparisuddhasilo samano ‘parisuddhasilomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddham me silam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:6.5: ‘ayam kho bhavam sattha aparisuddhasilo samano parisuddhasilomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddham me silam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:6.6: Mayanceva kho pana gihinam aroceyyama, nassassa manapam.
an5.100:6.7: Yam kho panassa amanapam, katham nam mayam tena samudacareyyama:
an5.100:6.9: yam tumo karissati tumova tena pannayissati’ti.
an5.100:6.10: Evarupam kho, moggallana, sattharam savaka silato rakkhanti;
an5.100:6.11: evarupo ca pana sattha savakehi silato rakkham paccasisati.
an5.100:7.1: Puna caparam, moggallana, idhekacco sattha aparisuddhajivo samano ‘parisuddhajivomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddho me ajivo pariyodato asankilittho’ti.
an5.100:7.3: ‘ayam kho bhavam sattha aparisuddhajivo samano parisuddhajivomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddho me ajivo pariyodato asankilittho’ti.

an5.100:7.9: evarupo ca pana sattha savakehi ajivato rakkham paccasisati.

an5.100:10.1: Puna caparam, moggallana, idhekacco sattha aparisuddhananadassano samano ‘parisuddhananadassanomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddham me nanadassanam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:10.3: ‘ayam kho bhavam sattha aparisuddhananadassano samano parisuddhananadassanomhi’ti patijanati ‘parisuddham me nanadassanam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.

an5.100:10.9: evarupo ca pana sattha savakehi nanadassanato rakkham paccasisati.
an5.100:10.10: Ime kho, moggallana, panca sattharo santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an5.100:11.1: Aham kho pana, moggallana, parisuddhasilo samano ‘parisuddhasilomhi’ti patijanami ‘parisuddham me silam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:11.2: Na ca mam savaka silato rakkhanti, na caham savakehi silato rakkham paccasisami.
an5.100:11.3: Parisuddhajivo samano ‘parisuddhajivomhi’ti patijanami ‘parisuddho me ajivo pariyodato asankilittho’ti.
an5.100:11.4: Na ca mam savaka ajivato rakkhanti, na caham savakehi ajivato rakkham paccasisami.
an5.100:11.5: Parisuddhadhammadesano samano ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhi’ti patijanami ‘parisuddha me dhammadesana pariyodata asankilittha’ti.
an5.100:11.6: Na ca mam savaka dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na caham savakehi dhammadesanato rakkham paccasisami.
an5.100:11.7: Parisuddhaveyyakarano samano ‘parisuddhaveyyakaranomhi’ti patijanami ‘parisuddham me veyyakaranam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:11.8: Na ca mam savaka veyyakaranato rakkhanti, na caham savakehi veyyakaranato rakkham paccasisami.
an5.100:11.9: Parisuddhananadassano samano ‘parisuddhananadassanomhi’ti patijanami ‘parisuddham me nanadassanam pariyodatam asankilitthan’ti.
an5.100:11.10: Na ca mam savaka nanadassanato rakkhanti, na caham savakehi nanadassanato rakkham paccasisami”ti.
